definition: mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: After the pit was closed tailings utilization and small fragmentary ore bodies development should be concerned.
sentences.chinese: 礦山閉坑後應繼續勘察開發零星礦體及綜合利用尾礦。

sentences.english: Suncor is promising to spend another C$1.2 billion to deal with its tailings.
sentences.chinese: 森科公司允諾再投入12億加元進行尾礦處理。

sentences.english: Transmission and the use of any means stacked tailings, depends primarily on its size.
sentences.chinese: 採用任何方式輸送和堆置尾礦，重要取決於它的粒度。

sentences.english: The computation of the dam body stability is an important content in a tailing pond safety assessment.
sentences.chinese: 壩體穩定性計算是尾礦庫安全評價中的一項重要內容。

sentences.english: Ash disposal area or tailing dam is special hydraulic structure.
sentences.chinese: 貯灰場或尾礦壩是屬於專門水工建築物。

sentences.english: Hydrological zoning in tailings impoundments is the main reason for geochemical zonation.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦庫的水文分帶是導致地球化學分帶的主要原因。

sentences.english: On Monday, heavy rains triggered the collapse of a reservoir of iron-ore waste at the mine in Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 星期一的暴雨導致這個非法鐵礦的尾礦庫倒塌。

sentences.english: Therefore, the comprehensive utilization of these tailings is an important task.
sentences.chinese: 因此，開展尾礦利用已成爲當今礦業界的重要任務。

sentences.english: Zhangmatun Iron Mine is situated in the suburbs of Jinan municipality, Shandong.
sentences.chinese: 張馬屯鐵礦位於濟南市東郊，地表無處建尾礦庫。

sentences.english: Purite is recovered by gravity separation from magnetically separated tailings.
sentences.chinese: 磁選尾礦通過重選回收黃鐵礦。

sentences.english: Tailings conveying system have been overstretched, has safety hazard.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦輸送系統一直超負荷運轉，存在安全隱患。

sentences.english: This kind of tailings are useless waste residues discarded after dressing gold ore.
sentences.chinese: 金礦尾礦爲黃金礦石經選礦後棄而無用的廢渣。

sentences.english: The tailing may be used as raw material to smelt zinc oxide by indigenous methods.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦可作爲土法冶煉氧化鋅的原料。

sentences.english: The landless vegetation slope protection of tailing dams is a new technology in our country.
sentences.chinese: 尾礦庫壩坡無土植被護坡在國內是一項新興的技術。

sentences.english: A reasonable utilization of tailings may shift the waste material into things of value, harness and improve the surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 合理開發利用尾礦資源，可治理環境，變廢爲寶。

sentences.english: This is a research on using marl and tailings from copper are and zinc ore to produce low energy consumption cement.
sentences.chinese: 研究利用泥灰岩和銅鋅尾礦代粘土燒製水泥熟料。
